研究可以为常规的眼神成像作为疾病筛查工具铺平道路研究人员已经进行了世界上最大的眼睛研究之一，以揭示对视网膜厚度的新见解，从而突出了其在早期发现2型糖尿病，痴呆和多发性硬化症等疾病中的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250205/study-could-pave-the-way-for-for-routine-routine-eyecare-image-imaging-imaging-imaging-as-a-a-a-a-disease-screening-screening-screening-tool.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250205/study-could-pave-pave-the-way-for-routine-routine-eyecare-image-imaging-imaging-imaging-imaging-aas-a-a-a-disease-sease-screening-screening-screening-tool.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=508EC6B7-3DD6-455F-A899-F7E7E702BC37EB Wed, 05 Feb 2025 14:05:47 -0500 Study could pave the way for routine eyecare imaging as a disease screening tool
